TextView.android:text: All Praise is due to Allah
اَللّٰھُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّعَلٰٓی اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
Allahumma SalliI Ala Muhammadiw Wa Ala Aali Muhammad
O Allah, let Your Blessings come upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad
لا حول و لا قوات إلى بالله
La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
There is no power nor strength except in God
There is no God except Allah
Allah is Sufficient for us. He is the Best Guardian
O Most Merciful of the Most Merciful
O the Ever-Living, The Ever-Living One
لا إله إيلاء الله الملك الحاقة المبين
Ther is no God but Allah, the King, the Obvious Truth
